alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 24 at 8:03AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Richland Creek At Belle Meade Near Harding Place affecting Davidson County. For the Nashville Metro Area...including Belle Meade Near Harding Place...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Richland Creek At Belle Meade Near Harding Place. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Low lying areas in the Belle Meade Country Club, residential areas near Percy Warner Boulevard, and along the creek from Harding Place to Belle Meade Boulevard begin to be inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 5.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 215 AM CST.
